Text.val: Author: Bujakowski Grzegorz
Creation date: 07.10.2010
04.11.2014 SH SCR19295 Removed range INVS_SREG_ID <> 2 (Russia) or INVS_PAYMENTDETAILS <> blank (second INVS selection)
01.07.2014 SH SCR18994 Added range INVS_SREG_ID <> 2 (Russia) or INVS_PAYMENTDETAILS <> blank (second INVS selection)
04.04.2014 GB SCR18816 Changed condition for set V.MQ262SL
17.02.2014 SH SCR18704 Added BCM038.PO.INVESTMENTGROUPC/BCM038.PO.PO.PENDINGADVANCESC
21.01.2014 SH SCR18655 Added BCM038.PO.CVCREDITMARGIN/BCM038.PO.CVCREDITMARGINGROUP
13.01.2014 SH SCR18623 Removed update INVS_UNTRADEDINVOICEPAID / INVS_FINANCEDATE (after call of BPH107)
10.01.2014 SH SCR18623 Added update INVS_UNTRADEDINVOICEPAID / INVS_FINANCEDATE (after call of BPH107)
01.08.2013 SH SCR18307 Added update INVS_COMMISSIONVATRATE
19.07.2013 SH SCR18298 Changed test to update V.MQ262OI = Y (added use of SBUY_PAYMENTSTOPAFTERDAYS)
21.06.2013 JH SCR18221 Added task Update INVS and Update CLNA
04.06.2013 SH SCR18179 Added test on INVS_SCSP_NO = 1 (Demica), see second INVS selection
12.08.2012 GB SCR17149 Added the Initially selection as first task
12.04.2012 SH SCR17245 Changed 2.Test Supplier limt (now calling BDC151)
27.03.2012 SH SCR17149 Added test on INVO_AACTUALI>0
06.05.2011 JOH SCR16406 Replaced GB002 by GB902
12.01.2011 SH SCR16127 Part "Advance is allowed": Added BSF109 and removed
storage of SFIP/SFIN
06.12.2010 SH SCR16043 Fixed bug updated SFIN_INVO_NO = INVS_INVO_NO
03.12.2010 SH SCR16038 Added test INVS_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT > 0 and changed
test on INVO_DUEDATE in test 3
28.10.2010 GB SCR15918 Changed level of called programs from
"every selected INVS row " to "every distinct INVS_DEBC_NO"
22.10.2010 GB SCR15900 Called the BPH128 with the GNRL_DAYPROGRAMSDATE
20.10.2010 GB SCR15894 Extended condition of selection
-- Initially select all INVOICE_SCF rows

SQL_STMT_U.val: select INVS_INVO_NO from :1/INVS where INVS_ADMNO = :2 and INVS_CLNTNO = :3 and INVS_CLNA_ID = 0 and INVS_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT > 0 and exists (select * from :1/INVO where INVO_NO = INVS_INVO_NO and INVO_AACTUALI = 0) and exists (select * from :1/BPIV where BPIV_INVO_NO = INVS_INVO_NO and BPIV_BTCH_BATCHCODE = ':4') order by INVS_DEBC_NO for fetch only

select INVS_INVO_NO from :1/INVS where INVS_ADMNO = :2 and INVS_CLNTNO = :3 and INVS_DUEDATE <= CASE WHEN INVS_EURZONE = 'Y' THEN ':4' ELSE ':5' END and INVS_CLNA_ID = 0 and INVS_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT > 0 and INVS_SCSP_NO= 1 order by INVS_DEBC_NO for fetch only

select INVS_INVO_NO, INVS_DEBC_NO, INVS_CURRENCY from :1/INVS where INVS_ADMNO = :2 and INVS_CLNTNO = :3 and INVS_DUEDATE <= case when INVS_EURZONE = 'Y' then ':4' else ':5' end and INVS_CLNA_ID = 0 and INVS_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT > 0 and INVS_SCSP_NO = 1 order by INVS_DEBC_NO for fetch only

Text.val: -- 1. Test Buyer limit
-- 2. Test supplier limit
--3. Test overdue invoices
-- Get PI.SCFH_NO
1. Test Buyer limit
2. Test supplier limit
3. Test overdue invoices
Test if advance is allowed

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum (INVS_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum (INVS_COMMISSIONAMOUNTDEM) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum (INVS_COMMISSIONVATAMOUNTDEM) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum (INVS_DISCOUNTVATAMOUNTDEM) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/INVS where INVS_ADMNO = :2 and INVS_CLNTNO = :3 and INVS_DUEDATE <= CASE WHEN INVS_EURZONE = 'Y' THEN ':4' ELSE ':5' END and INVS_CLNA_ID = 0 and INVS_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT > 0 and INVS_DEBC_NO = :6 for fetch only
